correlation of common loci
```{r}

#load corr data
mcap.corrs <- read.table("OLD_Output/Mcap_union5xCpG_PCAinput.tsv")
pact.corrs <- read.table("OLD_Output/Pact_union5xCpG_PCAinput.tsv")

pdf('OLD_Output/corrplot1.pdf', width=10, height=10)
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
pairs.panels(mcap.corrs, smooth=TRUE, scale=TRUE, density=FALSE, show.points=FALSE, ellipses=FALSE, 
             smoother=TRUE, gap=0.5, hist.col="light gray")
pairs.panels(pact.corrs, smooth=TRUE, scale=TRUE, density=FALSE, show.points=FALSE, ellipses=FALSE, smoother=TRUE, gap=0.5)
dev.off()


```

```{r}
mcap.corrs_w1_w2 <- mcap.corrs[,c(1,2)]
```
